

\section{图表定理}

\subsection{双 deflation (inflation) 的拉回 (推出)}

ET4 刻画了 conflation 关于 deflation 的推出; ET4' 刻画了或关于 inflation 的拉回. 依照正合范畴中的经验 (\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback}), conflation 关于 inflation 的拉回或 deflation 的推出也应诱导出四处 conflation. 本小节将分析这一事实.

\begin{theorem}\label{thm:bi-pullback}
	(双 deflation 的拉回). 对 $i\in \{1,2\}$, 取 $\delta _i \in \mathbb E(C, A_i)$. 此时有四处 conflation 作成的交换图
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	&& {A_2} & {A_2} \\
	& {A_1} & M & {B_2} & {\,} \\
	{\,} & {A_1} & {B_1} & C & {\,} & {\,} \\
	&& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow[equals, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{m_2}", tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{x_2}", tail, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{m_1}", tail, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\lambda_2}", two heads, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{\lambda_1}", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{(y_2)^\ast\delta _1}", dashed, from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{y_2}", two heads, from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{x_1}", tail, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{y_1}", two heads, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{(y_1)^\ast \delta_2}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\delta_1}", dashed, from=3-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{\delta_2}", dashed, from=3-4, to=4-4]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	特别地, 有等式 $(m_1)_\ast \delta _1 + (m_2)_\ast \delta _2 = 0$.
	\begin{proof}
		引入以下 conflation $\binom 11 ^\ast (\delta _1 \oplus \delta _2) \in \mathbb E(C, A_1 \oplus A_2)$:
		\begin{equation}
			% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{A_1\oplus A_2} && M && C & {\,} \\
	{A_1\oplus A_2} && {B_1\oplus B_2} && {C\oplus C} & {\,}
	\arrow["m", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["k", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\binom{1}{1}^\ast (\delta_{1} \oplus \delta _2)}", dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow["{\binom 11}", from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{x_1 \oplus x_2}", tail, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{y_1 \oplus y_2}", two heads, from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{\delta_1 \oplus \delta_2}", dashed, from=2-5, to=2-6]
\end{tikzcd}.
		\end{equation}
		记 $(e_1, e_2, p_1, p_2)$ 是直和 $A_1 \oplus A_2$ 中的结构态射. 由 ET4 (ET4'), 得以下交换图
		\begin{equation}
% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{A_1} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}{{A_1\oplus A_2}} & {A_2} & {A_2} & {A_2} \\
	{A_1} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}{M} & {B_2} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}{{A_1\oplus A_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}{M} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}{C} & {\,} \\
	& \textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}{C} & C & {A_1} & {B_1} & C & {\,} \\
	& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["{e_1}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{p_2}", two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["m", color={rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}, tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{x_2}", dashed, tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{e_2}"', tail, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{m_2}"', dashed, tail, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{m_1}", dashed, tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\lambda_2}", dashed, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["k", color={rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}, two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{y_2}", dashed, two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["m"', color={rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}, tail, from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{p_1}"', two heads, from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["k"', color={rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}, two heads, from=2-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow["{\lambda_1}"', dashed, two heads, from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{\binom 11 {}^* (\delta _1 \oplus \delta _2)}", color={rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}, dashed, from=2-6, to=2-7]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-6, to=3-6]
	\arrow["{\binom 11 {}^* (\delta _1 \oplus \delta _2)}"', color={rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}, dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-3, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_2}"', dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{x_1}"', dashed, tail, from=3-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{y_1}"', dashed, two heads, from=3-5, to=3-6]
	\arrow["{\delta_1}", dashed, from=3-6, to=3-7]
\end{tikzcd}.
		\end{equation}
		删减部分态射, 拼接以下两图即可:
		\begin{equation}
% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& \textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}{{A_2}} & {A_2} && {A_2} \\
	{A_1} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}{M} & {B_2} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}{{A_1}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}{M} \\
	&& C & {A_1} & {B_1} & C & {\,} \\
	&& {\,}
	\arrow[equals, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{m_2}", color={rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}, tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{x_2}", dashed, tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{m_2}"', dashed, tail, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{m_1}", dashed, tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\lambda_2}", dashed, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["k", color={rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}, two heads, from=2-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{y_2}", dashed, two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{m_1}"', color={rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}, tail, from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\lambda_1}"', dashed, two heads, from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow["k"', color={rgb,255:red,0;green,71;blue,224}, two heads, from=2-5, to=3-6]
	\arrow["{\delta_2}"', dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{x_1}"', dashed, tail, from=3-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{y_1}"', dashed, two heads, from=3-5, to=3-6]
	\arrow["{\delta_1}", dashed, from=3-6, to=3-7]
\end{tikzcd}.
		\end{equation}
		最后一处等式解释如下:
		\begin{align}
(m_1)_\ast \delta _1 + (m_2)_\ast \delta _2 &= (m_1p_1 + m_2p_2)_\ast \binom 11^\ast(\delta_1 \oplus \delta_2)\\
&= \binom 11^\ast m_\ast (\delta_1 \oplus \delta_2) = m_\ast \binom 11^\ast (\delta_1 \oplus \delta_2) \quad = 0.
\end{align}
	\end{proof}
\end{theorem}

\begin{theorem}\label{thm:pushout-of-two-inflations}
	(双 inflation 的拉回). 表述与证明略.
\end{theorem}

\begin{remark}
	将双 deflation 的拉回与双 inflation 的推出写作下图:
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	\bullet & \bullet & \bullet & {\,} & \bullet & \bullet \\
	\bullet & \bullet & \bullet & \bullet & \bullet & \bullet \\
	\bullet & \bullet && \bullet & \bullet & \bullet & {\,} \\
	{\,} &&&&& {\,}
	\arrow[tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow[tail, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{\text{PO}}"{description}, draw=none, from=1-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[dashed, tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_1}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,99;blue,255}, dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow["{r_1}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,99;blue,255}, dashed, tail, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow[tail, from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow[dashed, tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{l_1}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,99;blue,255}, dashed, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{l_2}", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,61}, dashed, two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{r_2}", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,61}, dashed, tail, from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[dashed, two heads, from=2-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow[dashed, two heads, from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{\text{PB}}"{description}, draw=none, from=2-5, to=3-6]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-6, to=3-6]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_2}", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,61}, dashed, from=3-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow[tail, from=3-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow[two heads, from=3-5, to=3-6]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _2}", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,61}, dashed, from=3-6, to=3-7]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _1}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,99;blue,255}, dashed, from=3-6, to=4-6]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	此时, 左图与右图分别蕴含等式
	\begin{equation}\label{eq:bi-PBPO-anti-eq}
		l_1^\ast \delta _1 + l_2^\ast \delta _2 = 0,\quad (r_1)_\ast \varepsilon _1 + (r_2)_\ast \varepsilon _2 = 0.
	\end{equation}
\end{remark}

以上定理存在一则实用的变体.

\begin{theorem}\label{thm:bi-PBPO-variant}
	(双 deflation 拉回的变体). 给定 conflation $\delta_1$, $\varepsilon$ 与 $\eta$ 使得下图实线方块交换:
	\begin{equation}\label{eq:bi-PBPO-variant}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& {A_2} & {A_2} \\
	{A_1} & M & {B_2} & {\,} \\
	{A_1} & {B_1} & C & {\,} \\
	& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow[equals, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{m_2}", tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{x_2}", dashed, tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{m_1}", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{\lambda_2}", two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\lambda_1}", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon }", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{y_2}", dashed, two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{x_1}", tail, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{y_1}", two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["\eta", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_1}", dashed, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\delta_2}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	此时存在虚线所示 $\delta_2$ 使得上图交换, 同时 $(y_1)^\ast \delta _2 = \eta$, $(y_2)^\ast \delta _1 = \varepsilon$, 以及 $(m_1)_\ast \delta _1 + (m_2)_\ast \delta_2 = 0$.
	\begin{proof}
		对 deflation 的复合 $y_1 \circ \lambda _1$ 使用 ET4', 得下图:
		\begin{equation}
			% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{A_2} & {A_2} \\
	{A_1\oplus A_2} & M & C & {\,} \\
	{A_1} & {B_1} & C & {\,} \\
	{\,} & {\,}
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{e_2}", dashed, tail, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{m_2}", tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{(s,m_2)}", dashed, tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{p_1}", dashed, two heads, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{y_1 \lambda_1}", dashed, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\lambda_1}", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["\kappa", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{x_1}", tail, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["0", dashed, from=3-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{y_1}", two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["\eta", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_1}", dashed, from=3-3, to=3-4]
\end{tikzcd}.
		\end{equation}
		此处 $(x_1)^\ast \eta = (m_1)^\ast (\lambda_1)^\ast \eta = 0$. 由 $\lambda _ 1 (s - m_1) = 0$, 故存在 $l : A_1 \to A_2$ 使得 $(s - m_1) = m_2 \circ l$. 下通过严格 ET4 (\Cref{prop:ext-tri-et4-unique}) 定义 $\delta _2$:
		\begin{equation}
% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{A_1} & {A_1} \\
	{A_1\oplus A_2} & M & C & {\,} \\
	{A_2} & {B_2} & C & {\,} \\
	{\,} & {\,}
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{\binom {1}{-l}}", tail, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{m_1}", tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{(s,m_2)}", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{(l \ 1)}", two heads, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{y_1 \lambda_1}", two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\lambda_2}", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["\kappa", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{x_2}", dashed, tail, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["0", dashed, from=3-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{y_2}", dashed, two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon }", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_2}", dashed, from=3-3, to=3-4]
\end{tikzcd}.
		\end{equation}
		使得左下方块交换的唯一态射是 $\lambda_2 \circ m _2 = x_2$. 由以上交换图, \Cref{eq:bi-PBPO-variant} 中的所有方块交换. 下检验扩张元的等式:
		\begin{enumerate}
			\item $(y_1)^\ast \delta _2 = (y_1)^\ast (l \ 1)_\ast \kappa = (l \ 1)_\ast (y_1)^\ast \kappa = (l \ 1)_\ast (e_2)_\ast \eta = \eta$;
			\item $(y_2)^\ast \delta _1 = (y_2)^\ast (p_1)_\ast \kappa = (p_1)_\ast (y_2)^\ast \kappa = (p_1)_\ast \binom {1}{-l}_\ast \varepsilon = \varepsilon$;
			\item $(m_1)_\ast \delta _1 + (m_2)_\ast \delta _2 = (m_1)_\ast (p_1)_\ast \kappa + (m_2)_\ast (l \ 1)_\ast \kappa = (s,m_2)_\ast \kappa = 0$.
		\end{enumerate}
		综上, $\delta _2$ 即为所求.
	\end{proof}
\end{theorem}

在 Abel 范畴中, \Cref{thm:bi-pullback} 与\Cref{prop:ext-tri-et4-unique} 是蛇引理的退化形式.

\begin{theorem}
	给定 Abel 范畴中可复合的态射 $f \circ g$, 则有六项正合序列
	\begin{equation}
		0 \to \ker g \to \ker (f \circ g) \to \ker f \xrightarrow{\delta} \operatorname{cok} g \to \operatorname{cok} (f \circ g) \to \operatorname{cok} f \to 0.
	\end{equation}
	记 $\cap$ ($+$) 为两个子对象的拉回 (拉回的一次导出极限). $\delta$ 的满-单分解是
	\begin{equation}
		\frac{\ker f}{\ker (f \circ g)} \twoheadrightarrow \frac{\ker f}{\operatorname{im} g \cap \ker f} \simeq \frac{\operatorname{im} g + \ker f}{\operatorname{im} g} \rightarrowtail \operatorname{cok} g.
	\end{equation}
	\begin{proof}
		见一般的同调代数教材. 基于蝾螈定理的证明见 \cite{wiseNONELEMENTARYPROOFSNAKE}. 在正合范畴中的推广见 \cite{rongStrongVersionSnake2021}.
	\end{proof}
\end{theorem}

\begin{example}
	\Cref{prop:ext-tri-et4-unique} 对应如下 Abel 范畴中 ses 的交换图:
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& \bullet & \bullet & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,61;blue,255}{{\text{``}\operatorname{cok} f\text{''}}} & {\,} \\
	{\,} & \bullet & \bullet & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,61;blue,255}{{\text{``}\operatorname{cok} g\circ f\text{''}}} & {\,} & {\,} \\
	&& {\text{``}\operatorname{cok} g\text{''}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,61;blue,255}{{\text{``}\operatorname{cok} g\text{''}}} \\
	&& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["f", tail, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[tail, two heads, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["g", tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\delta_f}", dashed, from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,51;green,61;blue,255}, dashed, tail, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{g\circ f}", tail, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[tail, two heads, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[tail, two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\delta_{g\circ f}}", dashed, from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,51;green,61;blue,255}, dashed, two heads, from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\delta_g}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\delta_c}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,61;blue,255}, dashed, from=3-4, to=4-4]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
\end{example}

\begin{example}
	\Cref{thm:bi-pullback} 对应如下 Abel 范畴中 ses 的交换图:
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	&& {\text{``}\ker g\text{''}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,54}{{\text{``}\ker g\text{''}}} \\
	& \bullet & \bullet & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,61;blue,255}{{\text{``}\operatorname{cok} f\text{''}}} & {\,} \\
	{\,} & \bullet & \bullet & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,61;blue,255}{{\text{``}\operatorname{cok} g\circ f\text{''}}} & {\,} & {\,} \\
	&& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow[tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-4, to=1-3]
	\arrow[tail, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["f", tail, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["g", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\delta_f}", dashed, from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[draw={rgb,255:red,51;green,61;blue,255}, two heads, from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{g\circ f}", tail, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow[two heads, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\delta_g}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\delta_{g\circ f}}", dashed, from=3-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{\delta_c}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,61;blue,255}, dashed, from=3-4, to=4-4]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
\end{example}


为了在外三角范畴中推广\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback}, 我们先熟悉几类同伦的推出拉回方块.

\subsection{同伦的推出拉回方块}

本节是\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback} 在外三角范畴中的推广.

\begin{theorem}\label{thm:homotopy-pullback-1}
	(同伦的推出拉回方块 I). 任给定扩张元的态射 $(\lambda, 1) : \delta \to \lambda_\ast \delta$, 存在 $w$ 使得下图交换, 同时左侧是同伦的推出拉回方块:
\begin{equation}
	% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X && Y && Z & {\,} \\
	A && B && Z & {\,}
	\arrow["a", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{\lambda }", from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["b", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["w", dashed, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\delta", dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow["x", tail, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["y", two heads, from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-5, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\lambda _\ast \delta}", dashed, from=2-5, to=2-6]
\end{tikzcd}.
\end{equation}
特别地, 左侧同伦的推出拉回方块对应如下 conflation:
\begin{equation}
	% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X && {A\oplus Y} && B & {\,}
	\arrow["{\binom {\lambda}{a}}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{(-x, w)}", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{y^\ast \delta}", dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
\end{tikzcd}.
\end{equation}

\begin{proof}
	考虑 $b$ 与 $y$ 给出的双 deflation 的拉回 (\Cref{thm:bi-pullback}), 得下图:
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	&& X && X \\
	A && {A \oplus Y} && Y & {\,} \\
	A && B && Z & {\,} \\
	&& {\,} && {\,}
	\arrow[equals, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\binom {\lambda'}{a}}", tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["a", tail, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{\binom 10}", tail, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{(0 \ 1)}", two heads, from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{(x,-w')}", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["0", dashed, from=2-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow["b", two heads, from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow["x", tail, from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["y", two heads, from=3-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{y^\ast \delta }", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{\lambda_\ast \delta}", dashed, from=3-5, to=3-6]
	\arrow["\delta", dashed, from=3-5, to=4-5]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	依照\Cref{eq:bi-PBPO-anti-eq}, 得
	\begin{equation}
		0 = \binom 10 _\ast (\lambda _\ast \delta ) + \binom {\lambda '}{a}_\ast \delta = \binom{\lambda + \lambda '}{a}_\ast \delta.
	\end{equation}
	由长正合列 (\Cref{eq:ext-tri-6-term}), $(\lambda + \lambda')$ 通过 $a$ 分解得到 $l$. 具体地,
	\begin{equation}
		(\lambda + \lambda') = \quad X \xrightarrow a Y \xrightarrow l A.
	\end{equation}
	遂有同构的态射序列:
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X && {A \oplus Y} && B & {\,} \\
	X && {A \oplus Y} && B
	\arrow["{\binom {\lambda'}{a}}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{(x,-w')}", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\binom {-1 \ l}{\ 0 \ \ 1}}", from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{y^\ast \delta }", dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{\binom {\lambda'}{a}}", from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{(-x,w)}", from=2-3, to=2-5]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	因此, 上图下方的态射列也是 $y^\ast 
	\delta$ 的实现. 这完成了证明.
\end{proof}

\end{theorem}

\begin{theorem}\label{thm:homotopy-pullback-1-dual}
	(同伦的推出拉回方块 I'). 上一定理的对偶表述. 此处仅给出关键的交换图:
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X && Y && Z & {\,} \\
	X && B && C & {\,} \\
	Y && {B \oplus Z} && C & {\,}
	\arrow["a", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["b", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["u", dashed, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\mu^\ast \delta}", dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow["\mu", from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["x", tail, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["y", two heads, from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["\delta", dashed, from=2-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow["{\binom u {-b}}", tail, from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{(y \ \mu)}", two heads, from=3-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{a_\ast \delta}", dashed, from=3-5, to=3-6]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation} 
\end{theorem}

\begin{theorem}
	(同伦的推出拉回方块 II). 任给定任意态射 $w$ 使得下图右侧方块交换.
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X && Y && Z & {\,} \\
	A && B && Z & {\,}
	\arrow["a", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{\lambda }", dashed, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["b", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["w", from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\delta", dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow["x", tail, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["y", two heads, from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-5, to=1-5]
	\arrow["\varepsilon", dashed, from=2-5, to=2-6]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	则存在态射 $\lambda$ 使得上图交换, $\varepsilon = \lambda_\ast \delta$. 同时, 左侧是同伦的推出拉回方块, 对应以下 conflation:
	\begin{equation}
	% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X && {A\oplus Y} && B & {\,}
	\arrow["{\binom {\lambda}{a}}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{(-x, w)}", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{y^\ast \delta}", dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
\end{tikzcd}.
\end{equation}

\begin{proof}
	依照 ET3' 任意取定 $\lambda' : X \to A$. 对扩张元的态射 $(\lambda', 1_Z)$, 依照\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-1} 取 $w' : Y \to B$ 使得下图交换 (共计四个 $2 \times 2$ 方块):
\begin{equation}
	% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X && Y && Z & {\,} \\
	A && B && Z & {\,}
	\arrow["a", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{\lambda '}", from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["b", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{w'}", shift left=2, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["w"', shift right=2, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\delta", dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow["x", tail, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["y", two heads, from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-5, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon }", dashed, from=2-5, to=2-6]
\end{tikzcd}.
\end{equation}
同时, 如下是同伦的推出拉回方块诱导的 conflation:
\begin{equation}
	% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X && {A\oplus Y} && B & {\,}
	\arrow["{\binom {\lambda' }{a}}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{(-x \ w')}", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{y^\ast \delta}", dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
\end{tikzcd}.
\end{equation}
由 $y \circ (w-w') = 0$, 依照长正合列 (\Cref{eq:ext-tri-6-term-dual}) 取 $(w-w') = x \circ l$. 考虑同构
\begin{equation}
	% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X && {A\oplus Y} && B & {\,} \\
	X && {A \oplus Y} && B
	\arrow["{\binom {\lambda' }{a}}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{(-x \ w')}", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\binom {1 \ l}{ 0 \ 1}}", from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{y^\ast \delta}", dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{\binom {\lambda }{a}}", from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{(-x \ w)}", from=2-3, to=2-5]
\end{tikzcd},
\end{equation}
其下行也是 $y^\ast \delta$ 的实现. 这完成了证明.
\end{proof}

\end{theorem}

\begin{theorem}\label{thm:homotopy-pullback-2-dual}
	(同伦的推出拉回方块 II'). 上一定理的对偶表述. 此处仅给出关键的交换图:
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X && Y && Z & {\,} \\
	X && B && C & {\,} \\
	Y && {B \oplus Z} && C & {\,}
	\arrow["a", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["b", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["u", from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\mu^\ast \delta}", dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow["\mu", dashed, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["x", tail, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["y", two heads, from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["\delta", dashed, from=2-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow["{\binom u {-b}}", tail, from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{(y \ \mu)}", two heads, from=3-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{a_\ast \delta}", dashed, from=3-5, to=3-6]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
\end{theorem}

\begin{theorem}\label{thm:homotopy-pullback-3}
	(同伦的推出拉回方块 III). ET4 (ET4') 公理中的方块 $\star$ 是同伦的推出拉回方块:
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X & Y & Z & {\,} \\
	X & W & M & {\,} \\
	& K & K \\
	& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["f", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["g", two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["\alpha", tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["\star"{description}, draw=none, from=1-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\delta_{r1}}", dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["r", tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=1-1]
	\arrow["p", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["q", two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\beta", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_{r2}}", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["s", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\delta_{c1}}", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_{c2}}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	$\star$ 诱导的 conflation 如\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-1-dual} 所示.
	\begin{proof}
		将证明分作两步. 
		\begin{quoting}
			\begin{lemma}
				$\star$ 是弱推出方块.
			\end{lemma}
			
			\begin{proof}
				任意取定等式 $n \circ g = m \circ \alpha$, 如下图所示:
				\begin{equation}
					% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X & Y & Z & {\,} \\
	X & W & M & {\,} \\
	& K & K && T \\
	& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["f", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["g", two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["\alpha", tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_{r1}}", dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["r", tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["n"{pos=0.6}, curve={height=-12pt}, dashed, from=1-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=1-1]
	\arrow["p", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["q", two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\beta", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["m"{pos=0.6}, curve={height=12pt}, dashed, from=2-2, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{\delta_{r2}}", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["s", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\delta_{c1}}", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_{c2}}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
				\end{equation}
				注意到 $0 = (m\alpha)_\ast \delta_{c1} = n_\ast g_\ast \delta_{c1} = n_\ast \delta_{c2}$, 故 $n$ 通过 $r$ 分解. 记 $l \circ r = n$. 由于
				\begin{equation}
					(m - l \circ q) \circ \alpha = m \circ \alpha - l \circ q \circ \alpha = n \circ g - l \circ r \circ g = 0,
				\end{equation}
				从而 $(m - l \circ q)$ 经 $\beta$ 分解, 记 $(m - l \circ q) = \lambda \circ \beta$. 上述态射的来源与去向如下:
				\begin{equation}
					% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X & Y & Z & {\,} \\
	X & W & M & {\,} \\
	& K & K && T \\
	& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["f", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["g", two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["\alpha", tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_{r1}}", dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["r", tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["n"{pos=0.6}, curve={height=-12pt}, dashed, from=1-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=1-1]
	\arrow["p", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["q", two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\beta", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["m"{pos=0.6}, curve={height=12pt}, dashed, from=2-2, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{\delta_{r2}}", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["s", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["l", dashed, from=2-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\delta_{c1}}", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["\lambda", curve={height=18pt}, dashed, from=3-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{\delta_{c2}}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
				\end{equation}
				今断言弱推出问题的解是 $l - \lambda \circ s$. 验证得
				\begin{enumerate}
					\item $(l - \lambda \circ s) \circ r = l \circ r = n$;
					\item $(l - \lambda \circ s) \circ q = l \circ q - \lambda \circ \beta = m$.
				\end{enumerate}
			\end{proof}
		\end{quoting}
		依照\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-2-dual}, 存在 $r' : Z \to M$ 使得 $(r', g, \alpha, q)$ 构成同伦推出拉回方块. 记态射 $l$ 与 $m$ 为两个弱推出方块相互分解所得, 如下图所示:
		\begin{equation}
			% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X & Y & Z & {\,} \\
	X & W & M & {\,} \\
	& K & K && M \\
	& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["f", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["g", two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["\alpha", tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_{r1}}", dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["r", tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{r'}"{pos=0.6}, curve={height=-12pt}, dashed, from=1-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=1-1]
	\arrow["p", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["q", two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\beta", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["q", curve={height=18pt}, dashed, two heads, from=2-2, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{\delta_{r2}}", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["s", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["l", shift left, dashed, from=2-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\delta_{c1}}", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_{c2}}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
	\arrow["m", shift left, dashed, from=3-5, to=2-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
		\end{equation}
		显然 $(1_Z, m\circ l, 1_K)$ 与 $(1_W, 1_{Z\oplus W}, l \circ m)$ 是都是 conflation 的自同态. 依照\Cref{thm:ext-tri-2-out-of-3}, $l$ 与 $m$ 都是同构. 由 conflation 对同构封闭 (\Cref{prop:ext-tri-isomorphism-closed}), $\star$ 也是同伦的推出拉回方块.
	\end{proof}
\end{theorem}

\begin{theorem}\label{thm:homotopy-pullback-4}
	(同伦的推出拉回方块 IV). 双 deflation 拉回所得的方块 $\star$ 是同伦的推出拉回方块
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& {A_2} & {A_2} \\
	{A_1} & M & {B_2} & {\,} \\
	{A_1} & {B_1} & C & {\,} \\
	& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow[equals, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{m_2}", tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{x_2}", tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{m_1}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{\lambda_2}", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\lambda_1}", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["\star"{description}, draw=none, from=2-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{(y_2)^\ast\delta _1}", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{y_2}", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{x_1}", tail, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{y_1}", two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{(y_1)^\ast \delta_2}", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_1}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, dashed, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\delta_2}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	如\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-1-dual} 所示, 方块 $\star$ 诱导了 conflation
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	M && {B_1 \oplus B_2} && C & {\,}
	\arrow["{\binom{\lambda_1}{\color{red}{-\lambda _2}}}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{(y_1, y_2')}", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{m_1^\ast (\delta_1)}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
\begin{proof}
	类似\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-3} 的证明, $\star$ 是弱拉回方块. 同时存在 $\lambda_1' : M \to B_1$ 使得 $(y_2)^\ast \delta_1$ 与 $\delta_1$ 满足\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-1-dual} 的条件. 由于弱拉回方块与同伦的推出拉回方块相互分解, 以及\Cref{thm:ext-tri-2-out-of-3},  $\star$ 同构于同伦的推出拉回方块. 由 conflation 对同构封闭 (\Cref{prop:ext-tri-isomorphism-closed}), $\star$ 也是同伦的推出拉回方块.
\end{proof}

\end{theorem}

\begin{theorem}
	(同伦推出拉回方块 IV'). 双 inflation 推出所得的方块 $\star$ 是同伦的推出拉回方块, 具体表述略. 此处仅给出关键的交换图:
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	A & {B_1} & {C_1} & {\,} \\
	{B_2} & M & {C_1} & {\,} \\
	{C_2} & {C_2} \\
	{\,} & {\,} \\
	A & {B_1 \oplus B_2} & M & {\,}
	\arrow["{x_1}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{x_2}", tail, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{y_1}", two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{m_2}", tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_1}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{m_1}", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,58}, tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{y_2}", two heads, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{\mu_1}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\mu_2}", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{(x_2)_\ast \delta_1}", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_2}", dashed, from=3-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{(x_1)_\ast \delta_2}", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\binom {x_1}{x_2}}", tail, from=5-1, to=5-2]
	\arrow["{(m_2 \ {\color{red}-m_1})}", two heads, from=5-2, to=5-3]
	\arrow["{(\mu_1)^\ast \delta _1}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, dashed, from=5-3, to=5-4]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
\end{theorem}

以下强化部分外三角范畴的公理.

\begin{proposition}
	(ET2-2 的强化表述). 假定 $(\alpha, \gamma) : \delta \to \eta$ 是扩张元的态射, 则存在分解 $\delta \xrightarrow {(\alpha, 1)}\varepsilon \xrightarrow{(1, \gamma)} \eta$, 且 $\star$ 是同伦的推出拉回方块:
	\begin{equation}\label{eq:ext-tri-2-2-strong}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	\bullet & \bullet & \bullet & {\,} \\
	\bullet & \bullet & \bullet & {\,} \\
	\bullet & \bullet & \bullet & {\,}
	\arrow[tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["\alpha", from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["\star"{description}, draw=none, from=1-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{\beta_1}", dashed, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["\delta", dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\beta_2}", dashed, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["\star"{description}, draw=none, from=2-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["\eta", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["\gamma", from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[tail, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon }", dashed, from=3-3, to=3-4]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	\begin{proof}
		取中间行为 $\eta = \alpha_\ast \delta = \gamma^\ast \varepsilon$ 的实现. 依\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-1} 与\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-1-dual} 构造两处 $\beta_1$ 与 $\beta_2$ 即可.
	\end{proof}
\end{proposition}

\begin{proposition}
	(ET3 的强化表述). 假定态射 $\alpha$, $\beta$ 与两处 inflation 作成交换方块. 存在分解 $\beta = \beta_2 \circ \beta_1$ 与态射 $\gamma$, 使得\Cref{eq:ext-tri-2-2-strong} 是扩张元的态射, 且 $\star$ 是同伦的推出拉回方块.
	\begin{proof}
		取 $\eta = \alpha_\ast \delta$, 依照\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-1} 构造 $\beta_1$ 与 $\beta_2$. 由于同伦的推出拉回方块是弱推出, 故 $\beta$ 经 $\beta_1$ 分解得 $\beta_2$. 最后使用\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-2-dual} 构造 $\gamma$ 即可.
	\end{proof}
\end{proposition}

\begin{proposition}
	(ET3' 的强化表述). 这是上一定理的对偶表述, 最终效果如\Cref{eq:ext-tri-2-2-strong} 所示.
\end{proposition}

\subsection{弱幂等完备}

依照 \cite{buhlerExactCategories2010a} 的第七章, 正合范畴中许多``理应成立的简单结论''依赖弱幂等完备性. 例如, 若所有可裂单 (可裂满) 都是容许单态射 (容许满态射), 则正合范畴是弱幂等完备的. 以下给出弱幂等完备在一般加法范畴中的定义.

\begin{definition}\label{def:weakly-idempotent-complete}
	(弱幂等完备). 称加法范畴 $\mathcal{A}$ 是\textbf{弱幂等完备}的, 若其满足以下等价条件:
	\begin{enumerate}
		\item 任意可裂满态射 $p : X \to C$ 存在核;
		\item 任意可裂单态射 $i : K \to X$ 存在余核.
	\end{enumerate}
	\begin{proof}
		以下仅证明 $(1 \to 2)$, 另一方向在反范畴中得证. 对任意可裂单态射 $i : K \to X$, 取可裂满态射 $q : X \to K$ 使得 $q\circ i = 1_K$. 记 $q$ 的核是 $j : C \to X$, 则 $(1_X - i\circ q)$ 通过 $j$ 分解:
		\begin{equation}
			% https://q.uiver.app/#q=WzAsNCxbMCwxLCJDIl0sWzEsMSwiWCJdLFsyLDEsIksiXSxbMSwwLCJYIl0sWzIsMSwiaSIsMCx7Im9mZnNldCI6LTIsInN0eWxlIjp7ImJvZHkiOnsibmFtZSI6ImRhc2hlZCJ9fX1dLFswLDEsImoiXSxbMSwyLCJxIl0sWzMsMSwiKDFfWCAtIGlcXGNpcmMgcSkiXSxbMywwLCJwIiwyLHsic3R5bGUiOnsiYm9keSI6eyJuYW1lIjoiZGFzaGVkIn19fV1d
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\& X \\
	C \& X \& K
	\arrow["p"', dashed, from=1-2, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{(1_X - i\circ q)}", from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["j", from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["q", from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["i", shift left=2, dashed, from=2-3, to=2-2]
\end{tikzcd}.
		\end{equation}
		容易验证 $j = j \circ p \circ j$ 与 $j \circ p \circ i = 0$. 消除单态射 $j$ 得 $p \circ j = 1_C$ 与 $p \circ i = 0$. 结合 $q \circ i = 1_K$ 与 $q \circ j = 0$, 得同构 $\binom{p}{q} : X \leftrightarrows C \oplus K: (j \ i)$.
	\end{proof}
\end{definition}

弱幂等完备的又一等价定义基于形变收缩.

\begin{definition}\label{def:deformation-retract}
	(形变收缩). 称对象 $X$ 是 $Y$ 的形变收缩, 若存在可裂单态射 $X \to Y$.
\end{definition}

\begin{proposition}
	加法范畴 $\mathcal{A}$ 是弱幂等完备的, 当且仅当任意形变收缩是直和项.
	\begin{proof}
		容易.
	\end{proof}
\end{proposition}

\begin{remark}
	预三角范畴自动是弱幂等完备的 (\Cref{cor:split-mono-epi}).
\end{remark}

\begin{example}
	(幂等完备, 也称 Karoubi 性质). 称加法范畴是\textbf{幂等完备}的, 若所有幂等态射有核与余核. 这一定义比弱幂等完备强, 例如以下两则例子.
	\begin{itemize}
		\item 记 $\mathcal{A}$ 是有限维实线性空间范畴, 加法全子范畴 $\mathcal{B}$ 包含一切维数为偶数 (含 $0$) 的线性空间. 显然 $\mathcal{B}$ 是弱幂等完备的, 但不幂等完备.
		\item 记 $\mathbf{Free}_R$ 是自由右 $R$-模构成的范畴. 今视之 $\mathrm{Mod}_R$ 的全子范畴, 则容易验证
		\begin{itemize}
			\item 包含 $\mathbf{Free}_R$ 的最小 (范畴等价意义下) 的弱幂等完备范畴是所有稳定投射模构成的范畴;
			\item 包含 $\mathbf{Free}_R$ 的最小 (范畴等价意义下) 的幂等完备范畴是所有投射模构成的范畴.
		\end{itemize}
	\end{itemize}
	三角范畴一般不是幂等完备的, 除非承认某些在特殊条件 (例如三角范畴有可数积或可数余积, 再如 \cite{leKaroubiannessTriangulatedCategory2007}). 三角范畴的幂等完备化的一般理论见 \cite{balmerIdempotentCompletionTriangulated2001}, 正合范畴的幂等完备化见 \cite{buhlerExactCategories2010a} 的第六章.
\end{example}

此小节中, 我们仅讨论外三角范畴的弱幂等完备性, 暂不理会幂等完备性. 以下\Cref{lem:inf-def-ex-1}, \Cref{lem:def-inf-ex-dual}, \Cref{cor:inf-def-ex} 与\Cref{cor:inf-def-ex-another} 无需弱幂等完备性, \Cref{cor:inf-def-ex-another} 指出弱幂等完备的关键作用是``消除赘余的零态射''.

\begin{lemma}\label{lem:inf-def-ex-1}
	外三角范畴中, 若 $q \circ p$ 是 inflation, $q$ 是 deflation, 则 $p$ 是 inflation.
	\begin{proof}
		证明同\Cref{lem:inf-def}, 将``Noether 同构''替换作``ET4' 公理'' 即可. \Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-3} 表明 $\square$ 是同伦的推出拉回方块, 故 $s$ 存在.
	\end{proof}
\end{lemma}

\begin{lemma}\label{lem:def-inf-ex-dual}
	外三角范畴中, 若 $j \circ i$ 是 deflation, $i$ 是 inflation, 则 $j$ 是 deflation.
	\begin{proof}
		上一引理的对偶.
	\end{proof}
\end{lemma}

以下是两则常用的推论.

\begin{corollary}\label{cor:inf-def-ex}
	若 $i$ 是 inflation, 则 $\binom{i}{f}$ 也是 inflation. 若 $p$ 是 deflation, 则 $(p \ f)$ 也是 deflation.
	\begin{proof}
		由 $(1 \ 0) \circ \binom{i}{f} = i$ 是 inflation, $(1 \ 0)$ 是 deflation, \Cref{lem:inf-def-ex-1} 表明 $\binom{i}{f}$ 是 inflation. 后一论断对偶.
	\end{proof}
\end{corollary}

\begin{corollary}\label{cor:inf-def-ex-another}
	若 $X \xrightarrow p Y \xrightarrow q Z$ 是 inflation, 则 $\binom{p}{0} : Y \oplus Z$ 亦然.
	\begin{proof}
		\Cref{cor:inf-def-ex} 表明 $\binom{p}{- q\circ p}$ 是 inflation. 左复合同构 $\binom{1 \ \ 0}{q \ \ 1}$, 得 $\binom{p}{0}$. \Cref{prop:ext-tri-isomorphism-closed} 表明 $\binom{p}{0}$ 是 inflation.
	\end{proof}
\end{corollary}

以下给出外三角范畴弱幂等完备的若干等价定义.

\begin{theorem}\label{thm:ext-tri-weakly-idempotent-complete}
	称外三角范畴弱幂等完备, 若满足如下等价定义.
	\begin{enumerate}
		\item 若 $i : A \to C$ 可裂单, 则 $i$ 有余核 $B$, 且 $i$ 分解作 $A \xrightarrow{\binom 10} A \oplus B \simeq C$;
		\item 若 $\binom i 0$ 是 inflation, 则 $i$ 也是 inflation;
		\item 若 $\binom{i \ \ 0}{0 \ \ j}$ 是 inflation, 则 $i$ 与 $j$ 也都是 inflation;
		\item 若 $f \circ i$ 是 inflation, 则 $i$ 也是 inflation;
		\item inflation 的形变收缩仍是 inflation (态射的形变收缩即作为态射范畴中对象的形变收缩).
	\end{enumerate}
	我们略去五个对偶的定义. 定义 1 与 1' 的等价性见\Cref{def:weakly-idempotent-complete}.
	\begin{proof}
		我们先证明 ($2 \leftrightarrow 4$).
		\begin{enumerate}
			\item ($2 \gets 4$). 若 $\binom{i}{0}$ 是 inflation, 则 $i = (1 \ 0) \circ \binom{i}{0}$ 是 inflation.
			\item ($2 \to 4$). 若 $f \circ i$ 是 inflation, \Cref{cor:inf-def-ex-another} 表明 $\binom{i}{0}$ 也是 inflation. 由假设, $i$ 是 inflation.
		\end{enumerate}
		继而证明 ($1 \leftrightarrow 4$).
		\begin{enumerate}
			\item ($1 \to 4$). 只需证明 ($1 \to 2$). 若 $\binom i 0$ 是 inflation, 取相应的 conflation $\delta$. 依照长正合列 (\Cref{eq:ext-tri-6-term}) 取分解所得的态射 $\binom{a}{b}$ 如下:
			\begin{equation}
				% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X && {Y \oplus Z} && W & {\,} \\
	&& {W \oplus Z}
	\arrow["{\binom i0}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow["0"'{pos=0.3}, curve={height=12pt}, from=1-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{(s \ t)}", two heads, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\binom {s \ \ 0}{0 \ \ 1}}"', from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\delta", dashed, from=1-5, to=1-6]
	\arrow["{\binom a b}"{pos=0.3}, curve={height=-12pt}, dashed, from=1-5, to=2-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
			\end{equation}
			注意到 $b \circ t = 1_Z$. 由题设, $b$ 是以 $Z$ 为像的可裂满, 不妨将 deflation 写作 $\binom{s_1 \ \ 0}{s_2 \ \ 1} : Y \oplus Z \twoheadrightarrow Y \oplus Q$. 依照\Cref{thm:bi-PBPO-variant} 构造交换图
			\begin{equation}
				% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& Z & Z \\
	X & {Y \oplus Z} & {Q \oplus Z} \\
	X & Z & Q
	\arrow[equals, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{\binom 0 1}", tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\binom 0 1}", tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\binom i 0}", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{\binom{s_1 \ \ 0}{s_2 \ \ 1}}", two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{(1,0)}", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{(1,0)}", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[dashed, tail, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow[dashed, two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
			\end{equation}
			左下方的 inflation 是 $i = (1 \ 0) \circ \binom i 0$.
			\item ($4 \to 1$). 若 $f \circ i$ 恒等, 则 $i$ 是 inflation. 因此所有可裂单 都是 inflation.
		\end{enumerate}
		再证明 ($2 \leftrightarrow 3$). ($3 \to 2$). 令 $j$ 是零态射即可. ($2 \to 3$). 若 $\binom{i \ \ 0}{0 \ \ j}$ 是 inflation, 则 inflation 的复合 $\binom{i}{0} = \binom{i \ \ 0}{0 \ \ j} \circ \binom 1 0$ 也是 inflation.
		\\
		最后证明 ($3 \leftrightarrow 5$). ($5 \to 3$). 显然. ($3 \to 5$). 以上证明了 $1$, $2$, $3$ 与 $4$ 彼此等价. 往证 $1$ 与 $4$ 共同推导出 $5$. 若 $f'$ 是 inflation $f$ 的形变收缩, 则存在可裂单 $i$ 与 $j$ 使得 $fi = jf'$. 由 $1$, $i$ 是 inflation, 从而 $fi = jf'$ 是 inflation. 由 $4$, 以及 $j$ 是 inflation, 得 $f'$ 是 inflation.
	\end{proof}
\end{theorem}

\subsection{九引理}

假定外三角范畴弱幂等完备, 本小节将证明九引理 ($3\times 3$ 引理) 在外三角范畴中类似物.

\begin{theorem}\label{thm:ext-tri-3x3-lemma}
	(九引理). 假定外三角范畴弱幂等完备. 给定以下四条 conflation 的交换图
	\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{A_1} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{A_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{A_3}} & {\,} \\
	{B_1} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{B_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{B_3}} & {\,} \\
	& {C_2} & {C_3} & {\,} \\
	& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["{f_A}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{g_A}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{i_2}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _A}", dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{i_3}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{f_B}", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{g_B}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{p_2}", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _B}", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{p_3}", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _2}", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _3}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	存在 $\delta_C$ 与 $\varepsilon_1$ 使得下图交换, 且所有相邻行与列都是实现间的态射:
	\begin{equation}\label{eq:ext-tri-3x3}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	\textcolor{rgb,255:red,2;green,143;blue,0}{{A_1}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{A_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{A_3}} & {\,} \\
	\textcolor{rgb,255:red,2;green,143;blue,0}{{B_1}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{B_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{B_3}} & {\,} \\
	\textcolor{rgb,255:red,2;green,143;blue,0}{{C_1}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,2;green,143;blue,0}{{C_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,2;green,143;blue,0}{{C_3}} & {\,} \\
	{\,} & {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["{f_A}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{i_1}", color={rgb,255:red,2;green,143;blue,0}, tail, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{g_A}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{i_2}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _A}", dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{i_3}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{f_B}", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{p_1}", color={rgb,255:red,2;green,143;blue,0}, two heads, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{g_B}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{p_2}", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _B}", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{p_3}", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{f_C}", color={rgb,255:red,2;green,143;blue,0}, tail, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _1}", color={rgb,255:red,2;green,143;blue,0}, dashed, from=3-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{g_C}", color={rgb,255:red,2;green,143;blue,0}, two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _2}", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_C}", color={rgb,255:red,2;green,143;blue,0}, dashed, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _3}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	\begin{proof}
		由 ET4, 取 $E$, $x$ 与 $y$ 如下:
		\begin{equation}
			% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{A_1} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,78;blue,255}{{A_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,78;blue,255}{{A_3}} & {\,} \\
	{A_1} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,78;blue,255}{{B_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,54}{E} & {\,} \\
	& {C_2} & {C_2} & {\,} \\
	& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["{f_A}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{g_A}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,78;blue,255}, two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{i_2}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,78;blue,255}, tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _A}", dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["y", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,54}, dashed, tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{i_2f_A}"', tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["x", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,54}, dashed, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{p_2}", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["\eta", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["z", dashed, two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _2}", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-3, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{(g_A)_\ast \varepsilon _2}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
		\end{equation}
		方块 $(g_A,y,i_2,x)$ 是同伦的推出拉回方块, 特别地, 这是弱推出. 此时存在 $\varphi$ 使得下图交换:
		\begin{equation}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	\textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{{A_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{{A_3}} \\
	\textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{{B_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,255;green,54;blue,51}{E} & {\,} \\
	& {\,} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}{{B_3}}
	\arrow["{g_A}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}, two heads, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{i_2}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}, tail, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["y", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,54;blue,51}, dashed, tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{i_3}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}, curve={height=-18pt}, tail, from=1-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["x", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,54;blue,51}, dashed, two heads, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{g_B}"', color={rgb,255:red,51;green,54;blue,255}, curve={height=18pt}, two heads, from=2-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["\square", draw=none, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\triangle"{description}, draw=none, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\varphi }", dashed, two heads, from=2-2, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
\end{equation}
		由\Cref{thm:ext-tri-weakly-idempotent-complete} 第四条的对偶, $\varphi$ 是 deflation. 对 $\triangle$ 与 $\square$ 分别使用 ET4' 与\Cref{thm:bi-PBPO-variant}, 得下图:
		\begin{equation}\label{diag:extri-4-2}
		% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{A_1} & {A_1} &&&& {A_3} & {A_3} \\
	{B_1} & {B_2} & {B_3} & {\,} & {C_1} & E & {B_3} & {\,} \\
	{C_1} & E & {B_3} & {\,} & {C_1} & {C_2} & {C_3} & {\,} \\
	{\,} & {\,} &&&& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["{i_1}", dashed, tail, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-2, to=1-1]
	\arrow["{i_2 f_A}", tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-6, to=1-7]
	\arrow["y", tail, from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow["\square"{description}, draw=none, from=1-6, to=2-7]
	\arrow["{i_3}", tail, from=1-7, to=2-7]
	\arrow["{f_B}", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{p_1}", dashed, two heads, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{g_B}", two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["x", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["\triangle"{description}, draw=none, from=2-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\delta _B}", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\psi }", tail, from=2-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow["{\varphi }", two heads, from=2-6, to=2-7]
	\arrow["z", two heads, from=2-6, to=3-6]
	\arrow["{(p_1)_\ast \delta _B}", dashed, from=2-7, to=2-8]
	\arrow["{p_3}", two heads, from=2-7, to=3-7]
	\arrow["{\psi }", tail, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _1}", dashed, from=3-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow["\varphi", two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["\eta", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{(p_1)_\ast \delta _B}", dashed, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{f_C}", dashed, tail, from=3-5, to=3-6]
	\arrow["{g_C}", dashed, two heads, from=3-6, to=3-7]
	\arrow["{(g_A)_\ast \varepsilon _2}", dashed, from=3-6, to=4-6]
	\arrow["{\delta _C}", dashed, from=3-7, to=3-8]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _3}", dashed, from=3-7, to=4-7]
\end{tikzcd}.
		\end{equation}
		今断言\Cref{diag:extri-4-2} 即为所求. 显然\Cref{eq:ext-tri-3x3} 中四个方块交换, 下检验扩张元的等式:
		\begin{enumerate}
			\item $(f_A)_\ast \varepsilon _1 = (f_A)_\ast \psi^\ast \eta = \psi^\ast (f_A)_\ast \eta = \psi^\ast z^\ast \varepsilon_2 = (z\circ \psi)^\ast \varepsilon_2 = (f_C)^\ast \varepsilon _2$;
			\item \Cref{diag:extri-4-2} 直接给出 $(g_A)_\ast \varepsilon_2 = (g_C)^\ast \varepsilon _3$;
			\item $(i_1)_\ast \delta_A = (i_1)_\ast y^\ast \eta = y^\ast (i_1)_\ast \eta = y^\ast \varphi^\ast \delta_B = (\varphi \circ y)^\ast \delta_B = (i_3)^\ast \delta_B$;
			\item \Cref{diag:extri-4-2} 直接给出 $(p_1)_\ast \delta_B = (p_3)^\ast \delta_C$.
		\end{enumerate}
	\end{proof}
\end{theorem}

九引理即 conflation 的``四推六'', 以下``五推六''变体无需弱幂等完备性.

\begin{theorem}
	给定以下五条 conflation 的交换图, 使得 $(g_A)_\ast \varepsilon_2 = (g_C)^\ast \varepsilon _3$:
	\begin{equation}
% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{A_1} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{A_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{A_3}} & {\,} \\
	{B_1} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{B_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{B_3}} & {\,} \\
	{C_1} & {C_2} & {C_3} & {\,} \\
	& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["{f_A}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{g_A}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{i_2}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _A}", dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{i_3}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{f_B}", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{g_B}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{p_2}", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _B}", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{p_3}", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{f_C}", tail, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{g_C}", two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _2}", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_C}", dashed, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _3}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	存在 $\varepsilon_1$ 使得下图交换, 且所有相邻行与列都是实现间的态射:
	\begin{equation}
% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	\textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,163;blue,27}{{A_1}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{A_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{A_3}} & {\,} \\
	\textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,163;blue,27}{{B_1}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{B_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{B_3}} & {\,} \\
	\textcolor{rgb,255:red,0;green,163;blue,27}{{C_1}} & {C_2} & {C_3} & {\,} \\
	{\,} & {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["{f_A}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{i_1}", color={rgb,255:red,0;green,163;blue,27}, tail, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{g_A}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{i_2}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _A}", dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{i_3}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{f_B}", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{p_1}", color={rgb,255:red,0;green,163;blue,27}, two heads, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{g_B}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{p_2}", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _B}", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{p_3}", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{f_C}", tail, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _1}", color={rgb,255:red,0;green,163;blue,27}, dashed, from=3-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{g_C}", two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _2}", dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_C}", dashed, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _3}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
	\end{equation}
	\begin{proof}
		将 $(g_A, g_C) : \varepsilon _2 \to \varepsilon_3$ 拆解如下:
		\begin{equation}\label{eq:ext-tri-3x3-45}
			% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	\textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{A_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{A_3}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{A_3}} & {\,} \\
	\textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{B_2}} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,78}{E} & \textcolor{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{{B_3}} & {\,} \\
	{C_2} & {C_2} & {C_3} & {\,} \\
	{\,} & {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["{g_A}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, two heads, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{i_2}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, equals, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["y", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,78}, tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _A}", dashed, from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{i_3}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["x", color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,78}, two heads, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{g_B}"{pos=0.3}, color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, curve={height=-18pt}, two heads, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{p_2}", two heads, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{\varphi }", two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["z", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _B}", dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{p_3}", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _2}", dashed, from=3-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{g_C}", two heads, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow[dashed, from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\delta_C}", dashed, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _3}", dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}.
		\end{equation}
		由 ET4 与\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-3}, 左上方块是同伦的推出拉回. 由\Cref{thm:bi-pullback} 与\Cref{thm:homotopy-pullback-4}, 右下方块是同伦的推出拉回. 由 $(g_A)_\ast \varepsilon_2 = (g_C)^\ast \varepsilon _3$, 不妨假定两处方块交于 $E$. 特别地, $\varphi$ 是 deflation.
		\\
		往后证明同\Cref{thm:ext-tri-3x3-lemma}. 需要注意, \Cref{eq:ext-tri-3x3-45} 蕴含了\Cref{diag:extri-4-2} 的右图 此处仅需通过\Cref{prop:ext-tri-et4-unique} 构造\Cref{diag:extri-4-2} 的左图. 最后验证扩张元的等式即可.
	\end{proof}
\end{theorem}
